author: wn.com
title: 12 October 2015 ‘Horrific’ terrorist attacks in Chad and Cameroon condemned by UN Security Council ...
text: ( Source : United Nations Security Council ) 12 October 2015 - The members of the UN Security Council have strongly condemned the 'horrific' terrorist attacks attributed to Boko Haram , perpetrated on Saturday and Sunday in the towns of Baga
